subject: AI
title: Setting Up Your AI Dev Env
description: Configure your local environment for AI development in minutes.

hook.text: A developer spends 3 days setting up an AI project. Their colleague does it in 10 minutes with the right template.

buildup.text: You need an API key, a client library, environment variables, and a way to manage secrets. That's the whole checklist.

discovery.text: Store keys in .env files, use official SDKs (openai, anthropic, google-generativeai), and set up a simple test script that proves your connection works.

twist.text: The #1 beginner mistake? Committing API keys to Git. Use .gitignore and secret managers from day one.

climax.text: With your env set up â€” key loaded, SDK installed, test passing â€” you're ready to build anything.

punchline.text: A clean dev environment is the launchpad. Don't skip it.

quiz.question: What is the most critical security step when setting up an AI dev environment?
options: Never committing API keys to version control
